text: Catch 21 is an American game show broadcast by Game Show Network. It was created by Merrill Heatter (who also produced the show's predecessor Gambit). It follows three contestants as they play a card game centered on blackjack and trivia. The show is based on a popular online game from GSN's website. It originally aired for four seasons from 2008 to 2011. It was hosted by Alfonso Ribeiro, with actress Mikki Padilla serving as card dealer. The show was revived on October 14, 2019, and concluded on January 21, 2020, with Ribeiro returning as host and Witney Carson as card dealer. Category:2008 American television series debuts Category:American television game shows Category:Television game shows Category:English-language television programs
title: Catch 21
